page.title: 04LIFE STYLES
page.content:
PLAS YN DINAS INN
Plas yn Dinas is a public house. The Plas was built in the 16th century around 1580.Once the Plas was a farm and the bottom lounge was a cowshed. There has been a exension built on to it in 1984.Plas yn Dinas has a black and white timber framed building.The Plas is T shaped.There is one bathroom and there are four bedroom's.And there are two lounges.Nearly each month a man comes and plays music.So we can dance.We sell Beer for 70p Wine 60p and we sell spirits for 60p a glass.There is a public bar.There is a snug and a lounge and a small dining room.Amusements for the public consists of pool table,darts boards,juke box and a gambling machine.
